title: $:/xp/mtw
name: MTW
description: Modifications to the TiddlyWiki official plugin
author: kl
text:
{"tiddlers":{"$:/config/DefaultSidebarTab":{"title":"$:/config/DefaultSidebarTab","text":"TableOfContents"},"$:/config/RelinkOnRename":{"title":"$:/config/RelinkOnRename","text":"yes"},"$:/config/SaveWikiButton/Filename":{"title":"$:/config/SaveWikiButton/Filename","text":"{{$:/SiteTitle}}"},"$:/config/Search/MinLength":{"title":"$:/config/Search/MinLength","text":"2"},"$:/core/macros/export":{"title":"$:/core/macros/export","tags":"$:/tags/Macro","text":"\define exportButtonFilename(baseFilename) $baseFilename$$(extension)$ \end \define exportButton(exportFilter:"[!is[system]sort[title]]",dragFilter:"[!is[system]sort[]]",lingoBase,baseFilename:"tiddlers") \whitespace trim <$vars hint={{{ [<__lingoBase__>addsuffix[Hint]get[text]] }}} caption={{{ [<__lingoBase__>addsuffix[Caption]get[text]] }}}> <$button popup=<> dragFilter=<<__dragFilter__>> tooltip=<> aria-label=<> class=<> selectedClass="tc-selected"> <$list filter="[match[yes]]"> {{$:/core/images/export-button}} <$list filter="[match[yes]]"> <$text text=<>/> <$reveal state=<> type="popup" position="below" animate="yes">
<$set name="count" value={{{ [subfilter<__exportFilter__>count[]] }}}> <$list filter="[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[$:/tags/Exporter]]"> <$list filter="[has[condition]subfilter{!!condition}limit[1]] ~[!has[condition]then[true]]" variable="ignore"> <$button class="tc-btn-invisible"> <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-download-file" $param=<> exportFilter=<<__exportFilter__>> filename={{{ [<__baseFilename__>addsuffix{!!extension}] }}}/> <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler=<>/> <$transclude field="description"/>
\end "},"$:/core/ui/AdvancedSearch/Filter/FilterButtons/export":{"title":"$:/core/ui/AdvancedSearch/Filter/FilterButtons/export","tags":"$:/tags/AdvancedSearch/FilterButton","text":"\whitespace trim <$reveal state="$:/temp/advancedsearch" type="nomatch" text=""> <$macrocall $name="exportButton" exportFilter={{$:/temp/advancedsearch}} dragFilter={{$:/temp/advancedsearch}} lingoBase="$:/language/Buttons/ExportTiddlers/"/> "},"$:/core/ui/Buttons/clone":{"title":"$:/core/ui/Buttons/clone","caption":"{{$:/core/images/clone-button}} {{$:/language/Buttons/Clone/Caption}}","description":"{{$:/language/Buttons/Clone/Hint}}","tags":"$:/tags/ViewToolbar","text":"\whitespace trim <$button message="tm-new-tiddler" param=<> tooltip={{$:/language/Buttons/Clone/Hint}} aria-label={{$:/language/Buttons/Clone/Caption}} class=<>> <$list filter="[[$:/plugins/felixhayashi/tiddlymap]plugin-type[plugin]] :filter[{$:/config/Plugins/Disabled/$:/plugins/felixhayashi/tiddlymap}!match[yes]]" variable="ignore"> <$list filter="[all[current]fields[]prefix[tmap.]]" variable="tmap"> <$action-deletefield $field=<>/> <$list filter="[match[yes]]"> {{$:/core/images/clone-button}} <$list filter="[match[yes]]"> <$text text={{$:/language/Buttons/Clone/Caption}}/> "},"$:/core/ui/Buttons/export-tiddler":{"title":"$:/core/ui/Buttons/export-tiddler","caption":"{{$:/core/images/export-button}} {{$:/language/Buttons/ExportTiddler/Caption}}","description":"{{$:/language/Buttons/ExportTiddler/Hint}}","tags":"$:/tags/ViewToolbar","text":"\define makeExportFilter() [[$(currentTiddler)$]] \end <$macrocall $name="exportButton" exportFilter=<> dragFilter=<> lingoBase="$:/language/Buttons/ExportTiddler/" baseFilename=<>/>"},"$:/core/ui/Buttons/save":{"title":"$:/core/ui/Buttons/save","caption":"{{$:/core/images/done-button}} {{$:/language/Buttons/Save/Caption}}","description":"{{$:/language/Buttons/Save/Hint}}","tags":"$:/tags/EditToolbar","text":"\whitespace trim \define save-tiddler-button() \whitespace trim <$fieldmangler><$button tooltip={{$:/language/Buttons/Save/Hint}} aria-label={{$:/language/Buttons/Save/Caption}} class=<>> <> <$list filter="[match[yes]]"> {{$:/core/images/done-button}} <$list filter="[match[yes]]"> <$text text={{$:/language/Buttons/Save/Caption}}/> \end <> "},"$:/core/ui/EditorToolbar/quote":{"title":"$:/core/ui/EditorToolbar/quote","caption":"{{$:/language/Buttons/Quote/Caption}}","condition":"[!has[type]] [type[text/vnd.tiddlywiki]]","description":"{{$:/language/Buttons/Quote/Hint}}","icon":"$:/core/images/quote","rewrite":"5.2.3","shortcuts":"((quote))","tags":"$:/tags/EditorToolbar","text":"<$action-sendmessage $message="tm-edit-text-operation" $param="wrap-lines" prefix=" <<<.br" suffix="<<<" /> "},"$:/favicon.ico":{"title":"$:/favicon.ico","type":"image/png","text":""},"$:/theme":{"title":"$:/theme","text":"$:/themes/xp-j"},"$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/metrics/sidebarwidth":{"title":"$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/metrics/sidebarwidth","text":"302px"},"$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/options/sidebarlayout":{"title":"$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/options/sidebarlayout","text":"fluid-fixed"},"$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/options/stickytitles":{"title":"$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/options/stickytitles","text":"yes"}}}
